page.title: 16Youth Organisations
page.content: Three nights a week the cubs meet in the cub hut opposite the village hall.They meet on Mondays(A pack), Tuesdays(B pack),and Wednesdays(C Pack).They play different types of games.At other times they go camping,mainly at Bispham Hall in Billinge.At eleven,boys may transfer to the scouts.Scout meetings are held on two nights,Thursday and Friday.For the girls there are packs of Brownies and Guides.Both Orginisations meet at the guide hut which is next to the scout hut.There is a meeting every weekday night for the Brownies and the guides meet on Thursdays and Fridays. All these organisations were formed by Lord and Lady Baden-Powell;the scouts in 1907 followed by the guides in 1910.
